title: What are you telling me ? Speak louder!

data.title: What are you telling me ? Speak louder!
data.statement:
Given an input string [[text]], you need to remove all vowels (A-E-I-O-U-Y) and return the text in uppercase.
*in the case where the modified text is empty, or only contains white spaces you must return the string {{null}}

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testIn: This is a rather lengthy text containing no vowels.
testCases.testOut: THS S  RTHR LNGTH TXT CNTNNG N VWLS.

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn: This text is quite long and doesn't have any vowels.
testCases.testOut: THS TXT S QT LNG ND DSN'T HV N VWLS.

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn: A E I O U Y

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: Y E A O U I

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn: As the sun dipped below the horizon, casting a warm golden glow across the tranquil landscape, the chirping of crickets and the gentle rustling of leaves in the gentle breeze created a soothing symphony of nature's melodies, wrapping the world in a cocoon of serenity that offered a momentary escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, allowing one to reflect upon the beauty and intricacy of the universe and their place within it, a fleeting moment of contemplation amidst the vast canvas of existence, where time seemed to slow down and the worries of the world seemed to fade into the background, replaced by a sense of awe and wonder at the marvels that surrounded them, reminding them of the simple joys that could be found in the smallest of moments, a reminder that amidst the chaos and challenges, there is always a space for stillness and appreciation.
testCases.testOut: S TH SN DPPD BLW TH HRZN, CSTNG  WRM GLDN GLW CRSS TH TRNQL LNDSCP, TH CHRPNG F CRCKTS ND TH GNTL RSTLNG F LVS N TH GNTL BRZ CRTD  STHNG SMPHN F NTR'S MLDS, WRPPNG TH WRLD N  CCN F SRNT THT FFRD  MMNTR SCP FRM TH HSTL ND BSTL F VRD LF, LLWNG N T RFLCT PN TH BT ND NTRCC F TH NVRS ND THR PLC WTHN T,  FLTNG MMNT F CNTMPLTN MDST TH VST CNVS F XSTNC, WHR TM SMD T SLW DWN ND TH WRRS F TH WRLD SMD T FD NT TH BCKGRND, RPLCD B  SNS F W ND WNDR T TH MRVLS THT SRRNDD THM, RMNDNG THM F TH SMPL JS THT CLD B FND N TH SMLLST F MMNTS,  RMNDR THT MDST TH CHS ND CHLLNGS, THR S LWS  SPC FR STLLNSS ND PPRCTN.

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: Amidst the bustling cityscape, where towering skyscrapers touch the clouds and neon lights paint the streets with a vibrant glow, people from all walks of life converge, each with their own dreams and stories, weaving a rich tapestry of humanity; the aroma of diverse cuisines dances through the air, as laughter and chatter form an intricate melody that resonates through the bustling markets, where vendors proudly display their wares, a kaleidoscope of colors and textures that beckon passersby; in the midst of this urban symphony, pockets of green oasis provide solace, parks and gardens where the rustling of leaves offers a soothing counterpoint to the urban rhythm, a place where families gather, children play, and couples steal moments of tranquility; as the sun sets, the city transitions, and the nightlife awakens with a new energy, music fills the night air as clubs and bars come alive with excitement, a vivid contrast to the daytime tranquility.
testCases.testOut: MDST TH BSTLNG CTSCP, WHR TWRNG SKSCRPRS TCH TH CLDS ND NN LGHTS PNT TH STRTS WTH  VBRNT GLW, PPL FRM LL WLKS F LF CNVRG, CH WTH THR WN DRMS ND STRS, WVNG  RCH TPSTR F HMNT; TH RM F DVRS CSNS DNCS THRGH TH R, S LGHTR ND CHTTR FRM N NTRCT MLD THT RSNTS THRGH TH BSTLNG MRKTS, WHR VNDRS PRDL DSPL THR WRS,  KLDSCP F CLRS ND TXTRS THT BCKN PSSRSB; N TH MDST F THS RBN SMPHN, PCKTS F GRN SS PRVD SLC, PRKS ND GRDNS WHR TH RSTLNG F LVS FFRS  STHNG CNTRPNT T TH RBN RHTHM,  PLC WHR FMLS GTHR, CHLDRN PL, ND CPLS STL MMNTS F TRNQLT; S TH SN STS, TH CT TRNSTNS, ND TH NGHTLF WKNS WTH  NW NRG, MSC FLLS TH NGHT R S CLBS ND BRS CM LV WTH XCTMNT,  VVD CNTRST T TH DTM TRNQLT.

testCases.title: Test 5
testCases.testIn: MY LOVE ABOUT YOU IS STRONG

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn: WHY IS LOVE AS STRONG AS ME
testCases.testOut: WH S LV S STRNG S M

data.inputDescription: <<Line 1>>: A string [[text]] is the the string to modify.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1>>: A string [[output]] which has its vowels removed and is written into capital letters or {{null}}.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given an input string text, you need to remove all vowels (A-E-I-O-U-Y) and return the text in uppercase.
*in the case where the modified text is empty, or only contains white spaces you must return the string null
Input
Line 1: A string text is the the string to modify.
Output
Line 1: A string output which has its vowels removed and is written into capital letters or null.
Constraints
1 ≤ text.length ≤ 1000
Example
Input
greetings
Output
GRTNGS
